verses.verse: And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, put <S%H2330>forth<s%> a <S%H2420>riddle<s%>, and <S%H4911>speak<s%> a <S%H4912>parable<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; A <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%>, <S%H83>longwinged<s%> <S%H750><s%>, <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5133>feathers<s%>, which had divers <S%H7553>colours<s%>, <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> the highest <S%H6788>branch<s%> of the <S%H730>cedar<s%>: divers: Heb. embroidering

He cropped <S%H6998>off<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of his young <S%H3242>twigs<s%>, and <S%H935>carried<s%> it into a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>traffick<s%>; he <S%H7760>set<s%> it in a <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7402>merchants<s%>.

He <S%H3947>took<s%> also of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5414>planted<s%> it in a <S%H2233>fruitful<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>; he <S%H3947>placed<s%> it by <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it as a willow <S%H6851>tree<s%>. planted: Heb. put it in a field of seed

And it <S%H6779>grew<s%>, and became a <S%H5628>spreading<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6967>stature<s%>, whose <S%H1808>branches<s%> <S%H6437>turned<s%> toward him, and the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof were under him: so it became a <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H905>branches<s%>, and <S%H7971>shot<s%> forth <S%H6288>sprigs<s%>.

There was also <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5404>eagle<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5133>feathers<s%>: and, behold, this <S%H1612>vine<s%> did <S%H3719>bend<s%> her <S%H8328>roots<s%> toward him, and shot <S%H7971>forth<s%> her <S%H1808>branches<s%> toward him, that he might <S%H8248>water<s%> it by the <S%H6170>furrows<s%> of her <S%H4302>plantation<s%>.

It was <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7704>soil<s%> by <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, that it might bring <S%H6213>forth<s%> <S%H6057>branches<s%>, and that it might <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, that it might be a <S%H155>goodly<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%>. soil: Heb. field

<S%H559>Say<s%> thou, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Shall it <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? shall he not pull <S%H5423>up<s%> the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof, and cut <S%H7082>off<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof, that it <S%H3001>wither<s%>? it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> in all the <S%H2964>leaves<s%> of her <S%H6780>spring<s%>, even without <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2220>power<s%> or <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to pluck it <S%H5375>up<s%> by the <S%H8328>roots<s%> thereof.

Yea, behold, being <S%H8362>planted<s%>, shall it <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? shall it not <S%H3001>utterly<s%> <S%H3001>wither<s%>, when the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5060>toucheth<s%> it? it shall <S%H3001>wither<s%> in the <S%H6170>furrows<s%> where it <S%H6780>grew<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H559>Say<s%> now to the <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H3045>Know<s%> ye not what these things mean? <S%H559>tell<s%> them, Behold, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, and <S%H935>led<s%> them with him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>;

And hath <S%H3947>taken<s%> of the <S%H4410>king's<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him, and hath <S%H935>taken<s%> an <S%H423>oath<s%> of him: he hath also <S%H3947>taken<s%> the <S%H352>mighty<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>: taken an: Heb. brought him to an oath

That the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> might be <S%H8217>base<s%>, that it might not lift itself <S%H5375>up<s%>, but that by <S%H8104>keeping<s%> of his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> it might <S%H5975>stand<s%>. but: Heb. to keep his covenant, to stand to it

But he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against him in <S%H7971>sending<s%> his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> him <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>. Shall he <S%H6743>prosper<s%>? shall he <S%H4422>escape<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> such things? or shall he <S%H6565>break<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and be <S%H4422>delivered<s%>?

As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, surely in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H4428>king<s%> dwelleth that made him <S%H4427>king<s%>, whose <S%H423>oath<s%> he <S%H959>despised<s%>, and whose <S%H1285>covenant<s%> he <S%H6565>brake<s%>, even with him in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Neither shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> with his <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>company<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> for him in the <S%H4421>war<s%>, by casting <S%H8210>up<s%> <S%H5550>mounts<s%>, and <S%H1129>building<s%> <S%H1785>forts<s%>, to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5315>persons<s%>:

Seeing he <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H423>oath<s%> by <S%H6565>breaking<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, when, lo, he had <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and hath <S%H6213>done<s%> all these things, he shall not <S%H4422>escape<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, surely mine <S%H423>oath<s%> that he hath <S%H959>despised<s%>, and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that he hath <S%H6331>broken<s%>, even it will I <S%H5414>recompense<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> upon him, and he shall be <S%H8610>taken<s%> in my <S%H4686>snare<s%>, and I will <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with him there for his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> that he hath <S%H4604>trespassed<s%> against me.

And all his <S%H4015>fugitives<s%> with all his <S%H102>bands<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and they that <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall be <S%H6566>scattered<s%> toward all <S%H7307>winds<s%>: and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; I will also <S%H3947>take<s%> of the highest <S%H6788>branch<s%> of the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%>, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> it; I will crop <S%H6998>off<s%> from the <S%H7218>top<s%> of his young <S%H3127>twigs<s%> a tender <S%H7390>one<s%>, and will <S%H8362>plant<s%> it upon an <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> and <S%H8524>eminent<s%>:

In the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H4791>height<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will I <S%H8362>plant<s%> it: and it shall bring <S%H5375>forth<s%> <S%H6057>boughs<s%>, and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%>, and be a <S%H117>goodly<s%> <S%H730>cedar<s%>: and under it shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> all <S%H6833>fowl<s%> of every <S%H3671>wing<s%>; in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of the <S%H1808>branches<s%> thereof shall they <S%H7931>dwell<s%>.

And all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have brought <S%H8213>down<s%> the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, have <S%H1361>exalted<s%> the <S%H8217>low<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, have <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>, and have made the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> to <S%H6524>flourish<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> it.
